titleStmt.title: The confession of the faith and doctrine beleeved and professed be the Protestantes of Scotland exhibited to the estatis of the same in Parliament, and be their publick votis authorized, as a doctrine grounded upon the infallible VVord of God.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
